ad_text: Ace Air Conditioning Sponsored Responsible for: • Diagnosing and repairing HVAC equipment failures and customer home or business comfort issues. • Performing equipment sets, start-ups, condenser sets, and preventative maintenance. • Proper completion of all paperwork & maintaining required levels of truck stock items. • Selecting the appropriate diagnostic and repair charges from the flat rate book per company policy. • Advising Service Manager or Coordinator if the assigned project begins to fall behind average repair times. Requirements · Two or more years of related HVAC experience. · EPA Certification · Current Driver's license that is in good standing. · Ability to demonstrate good common sense and sound judgment. · Ability to listen, take direction and follow through with assigned tasks. · Ability to work effectively with all staffing levels, local inspectors, and builders. · Must be detail-oriented, flexible, organized, and able to prioritize and work efficiently in a fast-paced environment without direct supervision. FULL-TIME · DEBARY, FLORIDA Lead HVAC/R Service Technician Apply now
